org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering

Class RenderChunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering.RenderChunk
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>

    public class RenderChunk
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
    Renders a chunk (multiple lines at once). Dispatched by ChunkRendererDispatcher.

    This method implements Callable with type Void

    Since:
    2019-01-14, v0.5
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Alex Kalinins

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(View view)
        Updates the view of the render chunk to be view. Also gets the latest RendererDetails from Renderer.
        Parameters:
        view - the view that is being updated.
